can you up! dead rising 2 off the record! and Dark souls (RF) and Air conflicts ! along with Rage the rd disc!

@steve30x if you have the latest dashboard installed in your 360 then the only thing you need to do is to get the disc drive flashed with LT+ 2.0 which enables your xbox to read all kinds of game backups, including the xgd3 ones like forza 4. Once you flash it, all you need to do is download this game and burn it to a dual layer blank dvd with imgburn!!!
This game is a revoliution. Get your racing gear ready, 'cuz when PAL version arrives, it's gonna' be pedal to the metal, girls !

For those who don't know. The New XGD3 disks are 8.7 GB Slightly larger than most burnable dual layer media out there. However the xbox modding community is on it. Apparently to play XGD3 games  one has to have LT2.0, the latest dashboard, VERBATIM DVD R DLs,  and ya have to buy a certain (currently undisclosed) DVD burner. The next release of jungle flasher will be able to flash the DVD burner with custom firmware, which will allow it to write ALL of the XGD3 Data to the disk. instead of 90% of it. Which would explain Dirty disk errors.
